amendment.description: Amendment clarifies local community authority to manage public rights-of-way and requires fair and reasonable competition for the use of those rights-of-way.
amendment.purpose: An amendment printed in House Report 104-223 as amendment No. 2-1, to clarify local communities authority to manage public rights-of-way and require fair and reasonable competition for the use of those rights-of-way.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stupak amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 338 - 86 (Roll no. 629).
